title: Title
drink_water_benefits: Improves energy, skin health, and brain function
stretch_break_desc: Do simple stretches to relieve tension
stretch_break_benefits: Reduces muscle tension, improves flexibility, increases energy
deep_breathing_benefits: Reduces stress, lowers blood pressure, improves focus
sunlight_benefits: Boosts vitamin D, improves mood, regulates sleep cycle
meditation_benefits: Reduces anxiety, improves focus, enhances self-awareness
gratitude_desc: Write down 3 things you're grateful for
gratitude_benefits: Improves mood, increases life satisfaction, strengthens relationships
device_break_desc: Stay away from all devices for 30 minutes
device_break_benefits: Reduces eye strain, improves focus, enhances real-world connection
single_task_desc: Focus on one task at a time for 25 minutes
single_task_benefits: Increases productivity, reduces stress, improves work quality
daily_priorities_desc: Identify your top 3 priorities for today
daily_priorities_benefits: Increases focus, improves time management, reduces stress
clear_workspace_desc: Organize and clean your work area
clear_workspace_benefits: Improves focus, reduces distractions, boosts productivity
planning_session_benefits: Improves organization, reduces stress, increases goal achievement
learn_new_desc: Spend 10 minutes learning a new skill or knowledge
learn_new_benefits: Stimulates brain growth, increases knowledge, boosts confidence
squats_benefits: Strengthens legs, improves posture, boosts metabolism
walk_benefits: Improves cardiovascular health, boosts mood, increases energy
jumping_jacks_desc: Do 20 jumping jacks to get your heart rate up
jumping_jacks_benefits: Improves cardiovascular health, burns calories, activates body
take_stairs_desc: Choose stairs over elevators whenever possible
take_stairs_benefits: Strengthens legs, improves cardiovascular health, burns extra calories
doodle_desc: Spend 5 minutes drawing or doodling freely
doodle_benefits: Stimulates creativity, reduces stress, improves focus
micro_story_desc: Write a very short story in 50 words or less
micro_story_benefits: Enhances creativity, improves writing skills, sparks imagination
different_route_desc: Use a different path to reach a familiar destination
different_route_benefits: Stimulates brain plasticity, increases awareness, sparks creativity
observe_details_desc: Spend 5 minutes noticing details in your environment
observe_details_benefits: Improves mindfulness, enhances creativity, increases awareness
exercise_daily_desc: Engage in at least 30 minutes of physical activity
exercise_daily_benefits: Boosts mood, improves health, increases energy
meditate_benefits: Reduces stress, improves focus, enhances well-being
read_books_desc: Read for at least 20 minutes daily
read_books_benefits: Expands knowledge, improves vocabulary, reduces stress
plan_day_desc: Spend 10 minutes planning your daily tasks
plan_day_benefits: Increases productivity, reduces stress, improves focus
ai_consistent_pairs_well: Since you've been consistently doing '{habitTitle}' for {streak} days, this pairs well with your routine
ai_trouble_easier_version: Having trouble with '{habitTitle}'? Try this easier version to build momentum
ai_no_category_habits: You don't have any {category} habits yet. This might be a great addition
ai_milestone_message: 🎉 Amazing! You've reached a {streak}-day streak on '{title}'! You're building real momentum.
ai_perfect_day_message: 🌟 Perfect day! You've completed all your habits. You're unstoppable!
ai_low_completion_message: 💪 Every expert was once a beginner. Start small today - even 1% progress matters!
ai_good_streak_message: 🔥 Your {streak}-day streak shows you have what it takes. Keep the momentum going!
ai_encouraging_1: 🌱 Small steps lead to big changes. You've got this!
ai_encouraging_2: ⭐ Progress, not perfection. Every day is a new opportunity.
ai_encouraging_3: 🚀 You're building the future you want, one habit at a time.
ai_encouraging_4: 💎 Consistency is the mother of mastery. Keep going!
ai_encouraging_5: 🌈 Your future self will thank you for the work you do today.

linkedAccounts.aboutText: Linked accounts allow you to sign in using external services like Google, Apple, or Facebook, and optionally sync certain data. You can disconnect these at any time.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Productivity Habit Tracker ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our mobile application.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.content:
• Account information (email address, username, profile picture)
• Habit tracking data and progress
• Mood and wellness data
• User preferences and settings
• Device information and usage analytics

automaticInfo.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
automaticInfo.content:
• Device type, operating system, and version
• App usage patterns and performance data
• Crash reports and error logs
• IP address and general location data

informationUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content:
We use your information to:
• Provide and maintain our services
• Personalize your experience
• Track your progress and provide insights
• Send notifications and reminders
• Improve our app and develop new features
• Provide customer support
• Ensure security and prevent fraud

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
• With your explicit consent
• For legal compliance or to protect rights
• With service providers who assist with app functionality
• In anonymized form for research and analytics

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
• End-to-end encryption for sensitive data
• Secure data transmission protocols
• Regular security audits and updates
• Limited access to personal data
• Secure cloud storage with reputable providers

privacyRights.title: 6. Your Privacy Rights
privacyRights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate information
• Delete your account and data
• Export your data
• Opt out of data collection
• Control privacy settings

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to provide services and comply with legal obligations. Habit tracking data is retained during your account period unless you choose to delete it. Anonymous analytics data may be retained longer for research purposes.

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our app is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers.

policyChanges.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy in the app and updating the last updated date. Your continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contactUs.title: 11. Contact Us
contactUs.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
Email: privacy@habittracker.com
Address: [Your Company Address]
Phone: [Your Contact Number]

moodTracking.title: Mood Tracking
moodTracking.content: Mood data is encrypted and stored locally on your device by default. You can choose to sync this data to our secure servers for backup and cross-device access.

socialFeatures.title: Social Features
socialFeatures.content: When using social features, you can control what information is shared with other users through privacy settings. Profile visibility and data sharing are opt-in features.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: We collect anonymous usage analytics to improve our app. You can opt out of analytics collection in privacy settings without affecting app functionality.

community.title: 👥 Community & Social
community.subtitle: Connect, share, grow together
community.upgradeMessage: Upgrade to Pro to access community features and connect with other users
community.beFirstToShare: Be the first to share your journey!

community.weWillMatchYou: We'll match you with compatible users soon!

dashboard.title: Performance Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor and optimize your app's performance
dashboard.criticalMemoryDescription: Your app is using too much memory. Consider closing unused tabs or restarting the app.
dashboard.highMemoryDescription: Memory usage is elevated. Monitor for potential memory leaks.
dashboard.tip1: Close unused browser tabs to free up memory
dashboard.tip2: Restart the app periodically for optimal performance

alerts.title: Performance Alerts
alerts.toggleDescription: Show real-time performance alerts and notifications
alerts.slowRenderingMessage: Render time is {time}ms, which is above the threshold of {threshold}ms
alerts.highMemoryUsageMessage: Memory usage is {usage}%, which is above the threshold of {threshold}%
alerts.lowCacheHitRateMessage: Cache hit rate is {rate}%, which is below the threshold of {threshold}%
alerts.noConnectionMessage: The app is currently offline. Some features may not work properly.
alerts.poorConnectionMessage: Network connection quality is poor. Performance may be affected.

settings.title: Performance Alerts Settings
settings.autoDismissDesc: Automatically hide alerts after a delay

recommendations.title: Performance Recommendations

recommendations.renderOptimizationMessage: Render time is {time}ms. Consider optimizing component rendering.

recommendations.networkOptimizationMessage: {count} network requests failed. Consider implementing retry logic.
recommendations.slowResponseTimesMessage: Average response time is {time}ms. Network optimization required.
recommendations.overallPerformanceIssuesMessage: Multiple performance issues detected. Comprehensive optimization recommended.

recommendations.noOptimizationsNeeded: No performance optimizations needed at this time.

boundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong
boundary.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Don't worry, your data is safe.

messages.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
messages.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
messages.authenticationError: Please log in again to continue.
messages.authorizationError: You do not have permission to perform this action.
messages.notFoundError: The requested resource was not found.
messages.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
messages.clientError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
messages.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
messages.retryMessage: Would you like to try again?
messages.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support.
messages.noInternetConnection: No internet connection. Please check your network settings.
messages.requestTimeout: The request took too long. Please try again.
messages.serverTemporarilyUnavailable: Server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
messages.resourceNotFound: The requested resource was not found.
messages.pleaseLoginAgain: Please log in again to continue.
messages.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access this resource.
messages.validationErrorForField: Please check the {field} field and try again.
messages.somethingWentWrongInApp: Something went wrong in the app

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By downloading, installing, or using the Productivity Habit Tracker app ("the App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the App.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: The App is a productivity and habit tracking application that helps users build and maintain healthy habits, track mood patterns, and improve overall well-being through:

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts and Registration
accounts.content: To access certain features of the App, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for:
responsibilities: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
All activities that occur under your account
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
prohibitions: Use the App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Interfere with or disrupt the App's functionality
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the App or its systems
Upload or share harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
Violate any applicable laws or regulations

privacy.title: 5. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection, use, and protection of your personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in our Privacy Policy.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. You may not modify, distribute, or create derivative works based on the App without our express written permission.

userContent.title: 7. User-Generated Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any content you create or upload through the App. However, by sharing content through the App's social features, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute such content within the App.

disclaimers.title: 8. Disclaimers and Limitations
disclaimers.content: The App is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the App will be error-free, secure, or continuously available. The App is not intended to provide medical, psychological, or professional advice. Always consult with qualified professionals for health-related concerns.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the App.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the App at any time, with or without cause or notice. You may also terminate your account at any time by deleting the App and ceasing all use.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes through the App or other appropriate means. Your continued use of the App after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the App shall be resolved in the courts of [Your Jurisdiction].

contact.title: 13. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
